author: henrib
msg: JEXL variable is 'reserved', does not appear in binding and shields user value; ie user value of that name must be accessed through 'context.JEXL'
Made JEXL.err, JEXL.out, JEXL.in point to defaut engine scope objects writer/errwriter/reader;
All JexlScripEngine instances share a unique JEXL engine instance and expression cache;
